title: 4 bed, 2 bath New Center Townhouse $2,200
posting_body: 4 bedroom, 2 full bathroom historic New Center Townhouse.
Offering a 12 month lease starting September 1st at $2,200 per month -- with option to extend to a longer term lease.
Historic features include hardwood floors, crown molding, french doors, and bay windows.
The townhouse also includes updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, updated bathroom, washer and dryer, finished basement, storage space, and private off-street parking.
Rent includes water and garbage removal.
Small pet friendly - pet deposit required.
Lovely and active neighborhood that is walking distance to New Center amenities such as: Q-Line, New Center Park, shops in the Fisher Building (incl.
hair salon, coffee shop, flower shop, furniture, women's apparel and Detroit gifts) as well as several new shops and restaurants on Woodward (incl.
Cooking with Que, Supino's, Ferne, Yum Village, Urbanum, Joe Louis Southern Kitchen) new Pistons Practice Facility, Tech Town, Henry Ford Hospital and new Henry Ford Cancer Center.
5 minute drive or 10 minute bike ride to Midtown/Wayne State Campus. 10 minute drive to Downtown Detroit.
First month's rent and security deposit ($4,400) due prior to move-in.
Must also complete a tenant application, including employment information, previous rental, references.
